title: Allows the Yonkers city school district to become an independent school district
summary: Allows the Yonkers city school district to become an independent school district; establishes members of the board of education of the city school district of the city of Yonkers shall be elected; establishes powers of superintendent and board of education of the city of Yonkers.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to allowing the Yonkers city school district to become an independent school district
